text: Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd God chɨn ak nop pel agnɨŋɨd apun, Nad ke Tesalonayka binɨb kɨlop aglɨl dɨnak okok kod yenɨmɨn apun. Gos kɨli nepal pal ak, nad kɨlop kɨles gɨl gɨtep ge nɨgtep gɨnɨgabal apun. Nɨgtep gɨl, binɨb gɨtep gep okok mɨdɨl, Klays nop gos nɨgɨlɨg, wog tɨtay gɨnɨgel okok am tep gɨnɨmuŋ apun.
